wikipedia_page.main: David Morgan (11 October 1959, Toronto – 1 September 2016) was a Northern Irish television presenter and journalist. He worked at the Irish News, BBC NI, and UTV (where he began his career in 2001) before ending his career as news editor at Citybeat.Morgan was married and had one son.

response: Al-Sharbi left the United States for Afghanistan in 2000,} David Morgan, "Saudi Man Admits Enemy Role at Guantanamo Hearing" , Reuters, 28 April 2006, hosted at Cageprisoners, accessed 12 February 2013 leaving his wife and daughter behind.
